attributes.action: STOP GENOCIDE IN KASHMIR BY INDIAN FORCES AND INNOCENT CIVILIANS BEING MURDERED.
attributes.background:
Since the past few weeks & months and Up Untill 30/09/2016 , the Indian Occupying Forces in Kashmir have killed over 100, injured 10,000 and blinded 600 innocent civilians.
We want British Government and its allies put pressure on Indian government to stop this genocide and withdraw its forces.
